item.title: C++ Never Do's
item.description:
C++ Never Do's:

https://www.logikalsolutions.com/wordpress/information-technology/never/

I particularly agree with never omitting {} around a
single statement condition, nevering putting { on the
same line as code, never butting more than 130 characters
on a line (though I normally still try to keep it below
75, except for URLs), and never putting local includes
before global includes.

item.title: Stop notifications about updating to Sonoma
item.description:
Stop notifications about updating to Sonoma:

https://lapcatsoftware.com/articles/2024/2/2.html

$ defaults write com.apple.SoftwareUpdate MajorOSUserNotificationDate -date "2025-02-07 23:22:47 +0000"
